code: import{useState}from"react";import{Container,Card,Row,Col,InputGroup,FormControl,Table,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{createAccount,deleteAccount}from"../api";import{useAuth}from"../AuthContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Accounts(_ref){let{accounts,getAllAccounts}=_ref;const{currentUser}=useAuth();const[value,setValue]=useState();const handleCreateAccount=async()=>{await createAccount(value);getAllAccounts();setValue("");};const handleDelete=id=>{deleteAccount(id);getAllAccounts();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"justify-content-md-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:"Accounts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{striped:true,bordered:true,hover:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Account Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Balance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Owner"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:accounts===null||accounts===void 0?void 0:accounts.map((account,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:account.accountname}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:account.balance}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:currentUser.displayName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"info",style:{padding:"5px",marginTop:"5px",marginLeft:"5px"},onClick:()=>handleDelete(account.id),children:"Delete"})]},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputGroup,{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormControl,{type:"text",placeholder:"New account name",value:value,onChange:e=>setValue(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{disabled:!value,type:"submit",onClick:()=>handleCreateAccount(),children:"Create Account"})]})})})})});}
